p: Statistical Tests—Univariate statistical tests were carried out using Microsoft Excel 2013 and Principal Component Analyses (PCAs) carried out using Metaboanalyst 4.0 [ 34]. PCAs were used to identify which samples grouped together in a data-driven manner (e.g., Figure 1). Investigation of the secondary hypothesis that the phospholipid profile comprised soya and/or milk lipids (e.g., Figure 2) used skimmed milk powder and soya milk as comparison samples. Skimmed milk powder is less perishable than fresh animal milk and varies little by season. It therefore represents cows’ milk lipids reliably.
